duties_responsibilities.duty: Assist in analysis, tracking, and resolution of compliance-related issues within the Physician Service Center.
Develop and maintain compliance resources, education, and presentations as requested.
Research and analyze corporate policies, federal payer rules, regulations, and transmittals as directed.
Log and report privacy-related issues, compliance-related issues, and patient concerns for appropriate reporting.
Assist with completion of periodic reviews, audits, and other requirements outlined in Company policies and standards.
Track and ensure timely completion of employee compliance education course requirements.

education_certification.credential: Bachelor’s Degree in Healthcare related field required; equivalent work experience may substitute education requirements
Registered Health Information Technician (RHIT) or Certified Professional Coder (CPC) preferred
